channel.title: Help with emotes please? I think it's an easy one!

item.title: Help with emotes please? I think it's an easy one!
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Ok. I have added some stuff so that you do some emotes and some graphics when you click a certain emote tab. But, I have 3 emotes set for the player to preform under the one action. My problem is that it only does the last emote. I need it to do the first emote, then the second, and then the last emote.

Here is what i currently have:

startAnimation(422); startAnimation(1125); startAnimation(2770); stillgfx(426, absY, absX); animationReset = System.currentTimeMillis() + 500;

So, you click the emote “Yes” which in my server is called “Steal” and you do the emote as if you were drunk. And the stars are spinning around your head. But, if what i want works then it’ll go a little something like this:
You do the emote like you are pickpocketing someone, then you get hit, then you have stars around you and you are drunk.

Thanks!

Read full topic
item.source: Help with emotes please? I think it's an easy one!
